response.overview: Presents Bill Viola's four most acclaimed works, structured around a solitary movement, moment or phenomenon through which he explores the nature of video, the categories of perception, the cognitive and spiritual inner life of the witness.
response.tagline: Presents Bill Viola's four most acclaimed works, structured around a solitary movement, moment or phenomenon through which he explores the nature of video, the categories of perception, the cognitive and spiritual inner life of the witness.
response.title: Bill Viola: Selected Works
